Most of the ppl here don't realize that Crysis 3 is a DX11 game!!! Your DX9 and DX10 card won't run this game until Crytek brings a new exe file that supports DX10 Graphic cards...We are screwed until than...
or update to modern standards since you game on your system and you're not screwed
